user_question: How do employees request time off?
system_answer: Employees can request time off by logging into their employee portal and navigating to the "Time Off" section. They should click "Request Time Off," select the type of leave (vacation, sick, personal, etc.), enter the start and end dates, and provide a brief reason for the request. The request will be automatically routed to the employee's direct supervisor for approval, and employees will receive email notifications regarding the status of their request.

user_question: How does the payroll processing work?
system_answer: Payroll processing is automated and operates based on the company's pay schedule, which can be weekly, bi-weekly, semi-monthly, or monthly. The system calculates gross pay by considering hours worked, salary, overtime, bonuses, and commissions. It then applies deductions for taxes, benefits, retirement contributions, and other withholdings. Payroll administrators review and approve the payroll before processing. Once approved, direct deposits are initiated, and pay stubs are automatically generated and made available to employees.
